Package stocks.model

Interface Portfolio

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFlexible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlexiblePortfolioImpl, InFlexiblePortfolioImpl
    public interface Portfolio
    This interface acts as model for virtual-trading application. It has implemented all trivial operations of trading like creating a portfolio by buying stocks/loading file ,getting total value of portfolio, view composition.

    • Method Summary

      • getTotalValueOfPortfolioOnCertainDate

        double getTotalValueOfPortfolioOnCertainDate​(java.lang.String date,
                                             java.lang.String portfolioName)
                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gives the valuation of the given portfolio as of a certain given date.
        Parameters:
        date - the date as of which total value needs to be calculated.
        portfolioName - the portfolio for which total value is needed.
        Returns:
        the total value calculated for given date.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • buyStocks

        void buyStocks​(java.lang.String companyName,
               java.lang.String quantity,
               java.lang.String date,
               java.lang.String com,
               java.lang.String portfolioName)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Buy stocks of a company and add to the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        quantity - number of stocks to be bought.
        companyName - company of which stocks need to be bought.
        portfolioName - portfolio to which bought stocks need to be added.
